Introduction

Junhyuk, born Lee Junhyuk, is a South Korean singer under DSP Media. He is a member of the boy group MIRAE. He was a former contestant on Produce X 101. He is a member of the upcoming Chinese-Korea boy group, POLARIX, formed through the survival show, Starlight Boys.

He debuted as a member of MIRAE on March 17, 2021 with the mini album Killa.
